name: IT201_Sprint03_Minas_Soliman
description:
This game is painting game where users can click to draw cubes, cylinders and spheres in a wide range of colors. There are many more features that the user can use if they choose and they are listed below.  The game has instructions on how to use the app and what to do and move to get access or use the many features of the game.

In this game there are three new animations.
First When the game starts there is no default background, if the user chooses they can make there background white by clicking the N key on their keyboard. The second Animation is to change the color of the text from orange to white according to whatever the user wants. To change trigger this animation, the user can press the C key on their keyboard. The Third and final animation is if the user wants to have a black background they can accomplish this by pressing the B key on their keyboard and trigger that animation.
